channel.title: [PI] Prayers issues
channel.description:
basically theres an issue with prayer its hard to tell if there switched on or off. sometimes the soulsplit icon for example might be lit up as if its turned on however the overhead icon is not there.
also when players die there prayer is still on. and this also is an issue when dueling people have pray on when dieing so when prayer is off in a duel they can use it.
